title: Vielo V+1 gravel bikes unleash more capable gen2, ready for every ride leaving tarmac
content:
When Vielo first debuted, their original V+1 was an all-road bike developed for British riders looking to be free from the constraints of smooth tarmac. Now three years later, that same V+1 has been reborn as a full-on gravel bike, still ready to take you on adventures from road to off-road with two different lightweight […]

The post Vielo V+1 gravel bikes unleash more capable gen2, ready for every ride leaving tarmac appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Cory Benson
